uniqueItems.name: Star Shard
uniqueItems.text: A piece of fallen star.  When five of star shards are found they can be used to increase health or magic.
uniqueItems.extra: Many of the wishes made have not been granted because the wishing stars have broken into pieces.

uniqueItems.name: Star Wand
uniqueItems.text: A magical wand used to control star magic.  Sparkles and light, what star magic is all about.
uniqueItems.extra: Tapping the magic button creates an arc of star magic.  Star magic is used to calm emotions, reflect danger, and find wishes.

uniqueItems.name: Monster Soup
uniqueItems.text: A tasty treat and a bit of star magic let's you summon friends from anywhere.
uniqueItems.extra: Holding the magic button summons your selected monster friend.  You will fall asleep while controlling the monster.

uniqueItems.name: Magic Candle
uniqueItems.text: A candle used to control fire magic.  Heat and energy, what star magic is also about.
uniqueItems.extra: Tapping the fire button shoots a fireball.  Fireballs can hurt monsters and start fires.

uniqueItems.name: Friendly Skull
uniqueItems.text: A ghastly prize used to fade walk.  Friends forever.
uniqueItems.extra: Holding the fade button makes allows you to walk through some walls and makes you invisible to enemies.

uniqueItems.name: Mirror Gem
uniqueItems.text: A magical stone used to see beyond.  Seeing all is often to see too much.
uniqueItems.extra: Holding the fade button reveals hidden objects and allows you to interact with them.

uniqueItems.name: Spell Book
uniqueItems.text: A book used to learn dragon magic.  Sought by many, found by you.
uniqueItems.extra: Holding the fire button creates an explosive orb.  Explosions can destroy many things.

uniqueItems.name: Shiny Apple
uniqueItems.text: An apple overflowing with magical power.  Used by Apple Witches to cast party spells.
uniqueItems.extra: There must be someone, somewhere who would want this fruit we just found laying about.

uniqueItems.name: Gold
uniqueItems.text: Used to purchase items in the Town of Desire.  Often found on the ground and in chests.
uniqueItems.extra: Gold used to be rare, but in the town of Desire where wishes came true it was mostly useless.

uniqueItems.name: Lost Key
uniqueItems.text: Used to open locked chests and doors.
uniqueItems.extra: Star magic can be used to turn lost keys into master keys.  Knock off the dirt and open any lock you come across.

friends.name: Slime
friends.text: The queen of blue slimes has pledged his people to your cause.  Summon a slime to squeeze into small places.

friends.name: Fibbit
friends.text: The fibbits of the wood want to see the world.  Summon a fibbit when you need something heavy.

friends.name: Bobo
friends.text: The bobos have faced their fears and wish to help you.  Summon a bobo to fly over obstacles.

hats.name: Star Earrings
hats.text: A simple set of earrings that sparkle like stars

hats.name: Winged Helm
hats.text: A golden helm decorated with pegasus feathers made in the style of ancient Nalkry warriors

hats.name: Red Horn Helm
hats.text: A helm to made with monster parts to scare enemies

hats.name: Black Hat
hats.text: A simple yet mysterious black hat given by a kindly snowman

hats.name: Magician Cap
hats.text: A simple cap often worn by royal wizards and healers

hats.name: Royal Cap
hats.text: Posh style combined with potent magic that keeps those who wear it safe

hats.name: Ranger Cap
hats.text: Worn by the long lost forest folk, who once protected the wild lands

hats.name: Witch Hat
hats.text: Often worn by powerful and intelligent witches who focus on complex magic

hats.name: Sparkle Star Earring
hats.text: A stunning pair of earrings that glisten like a comet in the night sky

necklaces.name: Gift of the Galaxy
necklaces.text: A swirl of sparkling star shaped stones that are worn as a necklace

necklaces.name: Oceans Pride
necklaces.text: A pearl necklace decorated with sealife made by the Queen of Sea herself

necklaces.name: Ruby of Life
necklaces.text: Warm to the touch, the amulet yearns to protect the life of anyone who wears it

necklaces.name: Dragon Friend Amulet
necklaces.text: Created for ancient dragon riders.  Made for those who can befriend even monsters.

outfits.name: Cosmic Gown
outfits.text: A simple gown often worn by star princesses

outfits.name: Guilded Plate
outfits.text: Protective armor forged for ancient Nalkry warriors.  Enscribed in the gold trim are words of a lost language.

outfits.name: Arcane Plate
outfits.text: Armor forged in the dark voids of space were wishes and stars have been swallowed by despire.  Hope and light masks the true potential held within this armor.

outfits.name: Black Jack
outfits.text: Mysterious black clothing that is mostly formal.  It tailors itself for a perfect fit.

outfits.name: Magic Cape
outfits.text: Although it is seen by many as a working class garment, it's fine threadwork is clear to trained eyes.

outfits.name: Royal Cloak
outfits.text: Fine silks and elaborate ribbons are layered to offer protection.

outfits.name: Ranger Leather
outfits.text: Ornate stitching covers this hardened leather.  Forest folk lived in armor such as this while patrolling among the wilds.

outfits.name: Witch Dress
outfits.text: Considered formal wear by the untrained.  Generations of powerful witches have made such dresses legendary.

outfits.name: Cosmic Gown
outfits.text: A beautiful gown often worn by star princesses.  This gown had it's cosmic luster restored and now grants extra protection.

rings.name: Super Nova
rings.text: A star shard ring that glows with magical starlight

rings.name: Oceans Grace
rings.text: A simple sea shell ring made by the King of Sea for his wife

rings.name: Ruby of Love
rings.text: Warm to the touch, the ring yearns to show love to anyone who wears it

rings.name: Folk Friend Ring
rings.text: Created for ancient dragons.  Made for monsters who can befriend even folk

shoes.name: Starsole Boots
shoes.text: Simple boots often worn by star princesses

shoes.name: Guilded Greaves
shoes.text: Protective footwear created for the ancient Nalkry warriors.  The Nalkry marched across the lands fighting for justice.

shoes.name: Sundae Shoes
shoes.text: High quality shoes often worn to weekly ice cream events.  Slightly uncomfortable and often kicked off.

shoes.name: Winklepickers
shoes.text: Dark pointy shoes perfect for kicking up trouble.  Not pointy enough to poke monsters.

shoes.name: Sheepskin Slippers
shoes.text: Possibly the most comfy of all footware and comfort is crucial for spell casting.

shoes.name: Royal Monk Shoe
shoes.text: Single strap, handmade, and overpriced.  Clicking these heels won't do anything special.

shoes.name: Ranger Boots
shoes.text: Soft and flexible boots that muffle your steps.  Flakes of dirt hang onto the sole from adventures long ago.

shoes.name: Witch Flats
shoes.text: Fashionable, check.  Comfortable, check.  Practicle, check.  The perfect everyday shoe for a witch on the move.

shoes.name: Starsole Boots
shoes.text: Well crafted boots often worn by star princesses.  The leather comes from miniature giant space beasts.

trade.name: Bubble Beverage
trade.text: A big mug of bubble beverage, which is often used to quench thirsts.

trade.name: Cheese
trade.text: A delicious hunk of stinky cheese.
